sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Veterans Preference Act.

sections.heading: Seasonal employment with Department of Transportation. Persons who have been members of the armed
sections.text:
forces of the United States or who, while citizens of the United States,
were members of the armed forces of allies of the United States in time of
hostilities with a foreign country, and have served under one or more of
the conditions listed under subsection (a) of Section 1 shall be preferred for appointment to and employment with the Illinois Department of Transportation for the positions of snow removal operator and winter salaried highway maintainer under the Department's Winter Seasonal Employment Program.

sections.heading: Every contract for such work shall contain a term providing for the
Any person who knowingly and wilfully violates the provisions of this
sections.text:
Act, is guilty of a petty offense and shall be fined not less than $75, nor
more than $300 for each offense.
